msg: QPID-2971, QPID-2972, QPID-2973: system tests for max delivery count with DLQs

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2974: add configuration for enabling/disabling DLQ functionality

author: scottbw
msg: Use BIDI-formatting rules for displaying human-readable widget metadata as used in the Wookie UI - title, short title, description, license etc. This is to enable us to pass W3C's i18n tests in the P&C test suite. This change affects the Widget Gallery view and the Admin views, but does not affect the REST API, which does not use the convenience methods in IWidget.

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2973: add JMX support for creating and manipulating queues with new DLQ functionality
